summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 62nd Street from Sand Point Way to east line of Avion City Addition; and certain other streets and avenues; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 15594 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
